reference.shortdesc: The subjectRelHeader element specifies the roles played by subjects in associations.

refbody.section: You use the subjectRelHeader element to supply a header row for a subject relationship table when you want to identify the roles played by the subjects in each column. Each cell in the header row identifies a subject topic that defines a role. When specializing the subjectRelTable element, you can accomplish the same purpose by specializing the cells within the rows to enforce the roles.

example.title: Example
example.p: For a complete example in the context of the subjectRelTable, see .
